optimize_viewing_experience.description: Rotate the display screen for optimal viewing and then sanitize it.

clean_for_better_viewing.description: Clean rotation screen to improve viewing quality.

rotate_screen_for_different_view.description: Rotate the display screen to provide a different viewing perspective.

rotate_screen_for_better_view.description: Rotate the screen to achieve a better viewing angle.

clean_screen_once_rotated.description: Rotate the screen, then proceed to clean it.

rotate_screen_then_clean_display.description: Rotate the screen for a better angle, then clean both the screen and display base.

rotate_and_clean_screen.description: Rotate the screen, then clean it for better viewing experience.

clean_and_rotate_screen.description: First clean the screen, then rotate it to a position suitable for viewing.

clean_screen.description: Clean the rotation screen to keep it clear.

rotate_screen.description: Rotate the screen to provide a better viewing angle.

rotate_and_wipe_screen.description: Rotate the rotation screen and then clean it to maintain its clarity and hygiene.

rotate_screen_and_then_clean_display.description: Rotate the rotation screen first and then clean the both screen and display base.

clean_rotation_screen.description: Clean the rotation screen to maintain its clarity and hygiene.

manipulate_rotation_screen.description: Rotate the display screen to adjust the viewing angle, then clean it.

routine_maintenance.description: Clean display base as part of routine maintenance.

adjust_screen_and_clean_base.description: Rotate screen first then clean base of the display.

upkeep_display_base.description: Clean the display base to maintain its attractiveness and functionality.

clean_display_base_only.description: Clean the display base to remove any accumulated dust or particles.

clean_base_and_screen.description: Clean the display base and then proceed to wipe the rotation screen for optimal cleanliness.

rotate_screen_and_clean_base.description: Rotate the screen and then clean the display base.

clean_display_base.description: Clean the base of the display to maintain its neatness.

clean_base_then_screen.description: Clean the fixed display base first and then clean the rotation screen to maintain their cleanliness and attractiveness.

maintain_whole_display.description: Clean entire display and adjust rotation screen for optimal functionality.

screen_rotation_and_full_display_cleanin.description: Rotate the screen, then clean the screen and base of display.

clean_and_optimize_display.description: Clean entire display and rotate screen for better viewing experience.

rotate_screen_and_clean_entire_display.description: Rotate the screen for optimal viewing, then wipe down the entire display.

full_display_clean_and_screen_rotation.description: Thoroughly clean the entire display, then rotate the screen for a comfortable viewing angle.

full_display_rotation_and_cleaning.description: Rotate the screen, then clean the entire display including the base and screen for a neat appearance.

rotate_screen_and_clean_display.description: Rotate the screen for better viewing, then clean the entire display, including the base.

clean_display_and_rotate_screen.description: Clean the entire display first, then rotate the screen to a suitable angle.

clean_whole_display.description: Clean the entire display including the screen and base.

clean_display_and_then_rotate_screen.description: First clean the entire display, including the rotation screen and the display base, and then rotate the screen.

rotate_and_wipe_whole_display.description: Rotate the rotation screen and then clean the whole display, including screen and display base.

manipulate_whole_display.description: Rotate the screen, then clean the entire display, including the display base.

manipulate_display.description: Rotate the screen and then clean the entire display.
